# The `MCRegister` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

Wrapper class representing physical registers. Should be passed by value. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>class llvm::MCRegister</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

Wrapper class representing physical registers. Should be passed by value.

Comparisons against register constants.

E.g.
<ul>
<li>R == AArch64::WZR</li>
<li>R == 0</li>
</ul>

### isStackSlot() {#a01c52fcd65bb831db823ecd35cf0a3ba}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="static constexpr bool llvm::MCRegister::isStackSlot (unsigned Reg)"
  labels = {["inline", "constexpr", "static"]}>
This is the portion of the positive number space that is not a physical register.

StackSlot values do not exist in the MC layer, see <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register/#a050c8e969ce1fa8c229b074fd07be925">Register::isStackSlot()</a> for the more information on them.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/mc/mcregister-h/#l00061">61</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/mc/mcregister-h">MCRegister.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

</SectionDefinition>
